title: OriginVault Verifiable Credential Schema
description: Schema for verifiable credentials issued within the OriginVault ecosystem.

@context.description: Contexts relevant to the VC, including the W3C and OriginVault namespaces.

id.description: A unique identifier for the credential.

type.description: The types of the credential, including specific types defined in OriginVault.

issuer.description: The DID of the issuer of the credential.

issuanceDate.description: The date and time when the credential was issued.

expirationDate.description: The date and time when the credential expires, if applicable.

id.description: The DID of the subject of the credential.

name.description: The name of the subject, if applicable.

email.description: The email of the subject, if applicable.

phone.description: The phone number of the subject, if applicable.

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the subject, specific to the OriginVault ecosystem.

credentialSubject.description: Information about the subject of the credential.

type.description: The type of proof, such as Ed25519Signature2020.

created.description: The date and time the proof was created.

proofPurpose.description: The purpose of the proof, such as 'assertionMethod'.

verificationMethod.description: The URI identifying the verification method used to create the proof.

jws.description: The JSON Web Signature (JWS) representing the proof.

proof.description: The proof used to ensure the integrity and authenticity of the credential.
